programme.desc: Our three contestants work their magic with satin and silks, brocade and lace, even as they race against time to make the perfect outfits for Sajini's masquerade ball theme. The stage is set to present Sajini as a Persian queen, a Victorian diva and a medieval princess. Which one of these avatars will suit her the most, and more importantly, which look will she like?

programme.title: Ming Lee c/o Manickam
programme.desc: A Chinese boy fostered in an Indian family? Yes! Ming Lee, a foster child, becomes an unexpected but necessary part of the Manickam family. Having been neglected form a young age, Ming Lee was brought up by his troubled parents, till the home had found the perfect foster family for him - the Manickams. An amusing story of how a young boy is trying to fit in a peculiar family with different people with the added challenge of cultural and language differences.

programme.title: Nizhalai Thedum Nijam
programme.desc: Keerthana has always believed that marriage can wait and at the same time doesn't believe in love. Her grandfather wants her to get married to Veera who is her paternal cousin.
